name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 14, depositors of Anhui Rural Bank in Henan Province expressed their demands at the People's Bank of China in Jiaozuo City, Henan Province. Tear gas was suspected to be used to disperse the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 15, in Yuncheng, Shanxi, local authorities organized to seal the windows on both sides of the road with paper in order to welcome President Xi Jinping to Yuncheng for inspection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A university in Chengdu issued a notice that it will hold a class meeting later this week for all Xinjiang minority students to learn the spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
It is currently widely reported in China that on the evening of May 14 and the morning of May 15, a high school student stabbed someone at the Tongzhou campus of Beijing Renmin University High School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 16, Beijing Capital Airport issued a notice that the airport will take more stringent security inspection measures in the near future.
It is recommended that passengers arrive at the airport 2-3 hours in advance and minimize carry-on luggage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 16, the owners of Luxi Yuefu sat in front of the Sichuan Tianfu New District Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision, reporting the Tianfu New District Park Bureau's inaction on the illegal bidding of the property in the early stage of the building.
It is reported that the early bidding of the property of the building was seriously illegal. The three bidding companies did not meet the requirements of the bidding documents, and the second and third winning candidates were professional bid-rigging households. In the end, Shuchuan Property won the bid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At Shanxi Taiyuan South Railway Station, the waiting area for passengers heading to Xi'an North is separated and requires secondary security checks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A local agency in Xi'an has announced the recruitment of security personnel for the Central Asia Summit. The requirements are 170+, no criminal record, obedient to management, and energetic young man. The salary is 120 yuan a day with meals included.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In a residential area in Xi'an, during the Central Asia Summit, residents need to collect "stickers" and can enter and exit with the "stickers" from then on. No other credentials can enter the residential area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Just now, Xinhua News Agency published a short commentary "The People's Army must not be offended and must be respected", "Obey the Party's command, can win battles, have a good style, and every word must not be offended."
Characterize the Xiaoguo talk show incident.

Event review:
On May 13, Weibo netizen "Manchester United fan Tian who does not want to be named" posted a message saying that in Xiaoguo Culture's offline talk show, the performer House used jokes to insult the People's Liberation Army.
On May 15, Xiaoguo Culture issued a statement that it has suspended the performance of the relevant performer House indefinitely and apologized to the public.
At present, his Weibo has been banned.
On the morning of May 15, the Beijing Municipal Cultural Law Enforcement Corps stated that it had filed a case against the relevant company.
On the same day, the People's Daily published an article criticizing: "Don't go off track when talking, and play with memes. One-sided pursuit of laughter without hesitation will fall into a misunderstanding. The heart is afraid, the words are cautious, and the actions are restrained. This should be the bottom line of the profession, and it should become an industry consensus. Only when the values ​​are established can the words and deeds not deviate. ​"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement, House's performance recording that night

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 16, a netizen filmed a video saying that the Dalian undersea tunnel was leaking.
It is reported that the tunnel was opened to traffic on January 1, 2024 and is known as China's second largest transportation project after the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge.
